title: How do you get a ribbon on your border?
body: What do you need to do to get a ribbon? {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

I believe you're referring to the Honor Ribbons, these are earned based on the amount of honor you receive for a particular category.

There are no specific numbers afaik.

Here's an image from the old client of the notification when you receive one of these,

http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/1/11/Lol_ranks_explained.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20121106035409
